name: Mona
tagline: Functional programming with a focus on speed, safety, and control
body:
Mona is a functional programming language with a focus on speed, safety, and control.

Repo: [github.com/corazza/monac-scala](github.com/corazza/monac-scala)

# Features

- Pattern matching
- Type inference
- Algebraic types
- Type classes
- Haskell-inspired syntax
- Unique reference semantics
- Ownership and borrowing

# Logo
